api.gbuild - package api.gbuild
This package provides basic data types and global constants and variables used during the construction of a gBuild component.
api.gbuild.component - package api.gbuild.component
This package contains the implementation of simple gBuild components the generic definition of one of them, and basic containers.
api.gbuild.component.button - package api.gbuild.component.button
This package includes all the types of buttons that can be used to construct complex components.
api.gbuild.component.dialog - package api.gbuild.component.dialog
This package provides the implementation of movable dialogs.
api.gbuild.component.menu - package api.gbuild.component.menu
This package offers the implementation of different types of menus.

GColor - Class in api.gbuild
Data type which stores a RGB color Processing language environment has utilities which can be used to define colors using RGB or HSV format.
GColor - Class in api.gbuild
Data type which stores a RGB color Processing language environment has utilities which can be used to define colors using RGB or HSV format.
GColor(Float...) - Constructor for class api.gbuild.GColor
Create a new instance of a RGB color Since RGB colors have three component (red, green, blue), this class can define a color passing one, two, or three of these components, so, when a value is not defined, will be equal to zero or null.
GColor(Integer...) - Constructor for class api.gbuild.GColor
Create a new instance of a RGB color Since RGB colors have three component (red, green, blue), this class can define a color passing one, two, or three of these components, so, when a value is not defined, will be equal to zero or null.
GColor(Float...) - Constructor for class api.gbuild.GColor
Create a new instance of a RGB color Since RGB colors have three component (red, green, blue), this class can define a color passing one, two, or three of these components, so, when a value is not defined, will be equal to zero or null.
GColor(Integer...) - Constructor for class api.gbuild.GColor
Create a new instance of a RGB color Since RGB colors have three component (red, green, blue), this class can define a color passing one, two, or three of these components, so, when a value is not defined, will be equal to zero or null.
GComponent - Class in api.gbuild.component
General definition of a gBuild UI component Since Processing figures are drawn at a specific location and dimension, this class considers a component as the set of 2D/3D primitives or figures located at a position, with an anchor and length, that can be visible or hided for user.
GComponent - Class in api.gbuild.component
General definition of a gBuild UI component Since Processing figures are drawn at a specific location and dimension, this class considers a component as the set of 2D/3D primitives or figures located at a position, with an anchor and length, that can be visible or hided for user.
GComponent(PApplet) - Constructor for class api.gbuild.component.GComponent
Create a new gBuild component Normally, components use basic Processing functions to draw or customize its properties.
GComponent(PApplet, GComponent) - Constructor for class api.gbuild.component.GComponent
Create a new gBuild component Components on gBuild can be related to another one which will be named as its parent.
GComponent(PApplet) - Constructor for class api.gbuild.component.GComponent
Create a new gBuild component Normally, components use basic Processing functions to draw or customize its properties.
GComponent(PApplet, GComponent) - Constructor for class api.gbuild.component.GComponent
